title: How to Make Spaghetti with Prawns and Garlic Sauce

steps.headline: Heat 3 tbsp of olive oil and 3 tbsp of butter in a pan on medium-low heat.
Add 5 garlic cloves (that are finely chopped) to the pan.
Then add 2 tbsp of finely diced red pepper.
After that add 2 tbsp of tomato puree and 125 ml of dry white wine.
Cook around 500 g of spaghetti or tagliatelle in boiling water until fully cooked.
Drain the pasta and add to the sauce.
Add 300 g of raw prawns to the pan and heat until the prawns turn pink.
Reduce the heat and stir in 125 ml of double cream.

text: Heat 3 tbsp of olive oil and 3 tbsp of butter in a pan on medium-low heat.  Add 5 garlic cloves (that are finely chopped) to the pan.  Then add 2 tbsp of finely diced red pepper. Stir for a few seconds. After that add 2 tbsp of tomato puree and 125 ml of dry white wine.  Cook for 10 minutes. Keep stirring for the 10 minutes. Cook around 500 g of spaghetti or tagliatelle in boiling water until fully cooked.  Drain the pasta and add to the sauce.  Add 300 g of raw prawns to the pan and heat until the prawns turn pink.  Reduce the heat and stir in 125 ml of double cream. Cook until it has thickened. Season to taste and serve!  Finished.
